metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3697 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Ansible in the amazon.aws collection when using the tower_callback parameter from the amazon.aws.ec2_instance module. This flaw allows an attacker to take advantage of this issue as the module is handling the parameter insecurely, leading to the password leaking in the logs.

notes.Note: sbeattie> core ansible binaries were split into ansible-base, which got renamed to ansible-core

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
